name: Euclidian Distance
full_name: Euclidian distance of journal and discipline country profile
short_desc: The euclidian distance between journal country distribution and the disciplines country distribution.

name: Cosine Distance
full_name: Cosine distance of journal and discipline country profile
short_desc: The cosine distance between journal country distribution and the disciplines country distribution

name: Maximum Difference
full_name: Maximum difference of journal and discipline country profile
short_desc: The maximum distance between journal country distribution and the disciplines country distribution

name: Cityblock Distance
full_name: Cityblock distance of journal and discipline country profile
short_desc: The cityblock distance between journal country distribution and the disciplines country distribution

name: GiniSimpson Index
full_name: GiniSimpson diversity  of journal country distribution
short_desc: Gini-Simpson Index is a standard tool for measuring diversity in ecology. This indicator does not take into account size of research sectors in different countries
input: Number of documents in the journal countries $D_{c,j,y}$ .

name: Largest Institutions
full_name: Share of 3 largest institutions on all documents
short_desc: The share of three largest institutions on total number of documents. The basic assumption is that the more globalized journal the more institutions participate on publishing
input: $D_{i,y,j}^{Sorted}$ is the number of documents in the journal $j$ from particular institution $i$. The documents are sorted from largest to smallest.

name: Largest Contributors Surplus
short_desc: The surplus share of 3 journal's most contributing countries over the disciplines's share of the same countries.

name: English Documents
short_desc: The share of English-written documents on all documents

name: Local Documents
full_name: Share of authors from journal's domicile
short_desc: The share of documents from the same country as the journal
input: Number of documents $D_{LOCAL,j,y}$ from the same country as the journal's publisher

name: Weighted Gini
full_name: Gini Index weighted by discipline country profile
short_desc: The Gini index adjusted for unequally weighted observations. The observations are weighted by the disciplines distribution
formula: \begin{equation*} w= \begin{bmatrix} \sum_{c=1}^1 m_{c,d,y} \\..\\  \sum_{c=1}^n m_{c,d,y} \end{bmatrix}  \quad v= \begin{bmatrix} \sum_{c=1}^1 x_{c,j,y} m_{c,d,y} \\ ..\\ \sum_{c=1}^n x_{c,j,y} m_{c,d,y} \end{bmatrix} \end{equation*}
